statements: SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking WHERE stock_level > 50;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM inventory_tracking WHERE warehouse_id = 2;
SELECT product_name, stock_level, last_updated FROM inventory_tracking WHERE product_id = 3;
SELECT product_name, warehouse_id FROM inventory_tracking WHERE stock_level < 20;
SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM inventory_tracking WHERE stock_level > 50 ORDER BY stock_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking WHERE warehouse_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, warehouse_id FROM inventory_tracking WHERE stock_level < 10 AND warehouse_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, stock_level, last_updated FROM inventory_tracking ORDER BY last_updated DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT warehouse_id FROM inventory_tracking WHERE stock_level < 20;
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels
SELECT product_id, stock_quantity FROM inventory_levels
SELECT warehouse_id, location, temperature, humidity FROM warehouses
SELECT * FROM warehouses
SELECT product_id, stock_quantity, warehouse_id FROM inventory_levels
SELECT product_id, stock_quantity, warehouse_id FROM inventory_levels WHERE stock_quantity > 100 ORDER BY warehouse_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE warehouse_id = 1 AND stock_quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT product_id, stock_quantity, warehouse_id, location FROM inventory_levels JOIN warehouses ON inventory_levels.warehouse_id = warehouses.warehouse_id;
SELECT MAX(stock_quantity), MIN(stock_quantity), AVG(stock_quantity) FROM inventory_levels GROUP BY warehouse_id;
SELECT warehouse_id, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM inventory_levels GROUP BY warehouse_id HAVING COUNT(product_id) > 3 ORDER BY total_products DESC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT location, product_name, quantity FROM Inventory ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT warehouse_name, location, capacity FROM Warehouse WHERE capacity >= 100;
SELECT transaction_id, product_id, transaction_type, quantity, transaction_time FROM StockTransactions ORDER BY transaction_time DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity, location FROM Inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT warehouse_name, location, capacity FROM Warehouse WHERE capacity > 1000 ORDER BY capacity ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity, location FROM Inventory WHERE location='A1' AND quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM Warehouse WHERE capacity >= 5000;
SELECT product_id, quantity, transaction_type FROM StockTransactions WHERE transaction_type='OUT' ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM Warehouse;
SELECT warehouse_id, location, capacity FROM Warehouse;
SELECT * FROM Product WHERE category='Electronics';
SELECT name, category FROM Product WHERE product_id=3;
SELECT data_id, temperature, humidity FROM SensorData WHERE warehouse_id=2;
SELECT * FROM Warehouse;
SELECT name, category FROM Product WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT location, capacity FROM Warehouse WHERE capacity > 100;
SELECT p.name, w.location, i.quantity FROM Product p JOIN Inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id JOIN Warehouse w ON i.warehouse_id = w.warehouse_id;
SELECT data_id, temperature, humidity, timestamp FROM SensorData WHERE warehouse_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM Warehouses;
SELECT warehouse_id, warehouse_name, region FROM Warehouses ORDER BY manager_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, price, weight FROM Products WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT warehouse_id, location_name, latitude, longitude FROM WarehouseLocations WHERE warehouse_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price <= 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM WarehouseLocations ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT warehouse_id, location_name, latitude, longitude FROM WarehouseLocations WHERE latitude < 0;
SELECT warehouse_name, region, manager_name FROM Warehouses WHERE region = 'East';
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM InventoryLog WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
